name: Sashimi, Chinese Style
recipeIngredient: 1 green onion, trimmed, chopped very fine
1 pound skinless salmon, tuna or wild striped-bass fillet, very thinly sliced across the grain

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the first 6 ingredients in a shallow bowl, add the fish and toss gently to coat. Let stand for 10 minutes. Spoon fish neatly onto chilled plates; garnish with cilantro.
